_comment: User Configuration Template for PhotoBanking Scripts
_instructions: 1. Copy this file to 'user.config.json' in the same directory
3. IMPORTANT: 'user.config.json' is already in .gitignore and will NOT be committed to Git
4. Alternatively, you can set environment variables: PHOTOBANK_USERNAME, PHOTOBANK_AUTHOR, PHOTOBANK_LOCATION, PHOTOBANK_EMAIL
author: Your Full Name

_notes.username: Your username for photobank submissions (used in exports)
_notes.author: Your full name or artist name for copyright notices
_notes.location: Your default location for photo metadata
_notes.email: Your contact email (optional, used for metadata)
